summary: My cozy house (tower) that I would like to share with you!
descriptionHtml:
TOWER of the KING                       

Update available:  
- less high-leveled items
- some lights have been added
- as well as other minor changes


This is my house with beautiful paintings and cozy living room, and wonderful views,
that i would share with you.

Included are: 
a Forge
a Workbench
a Grindstone
a Chopping Block
an Alchemy Table
an Enchanting Table
a Smelter
some NPCs
a high tower and more but see for yourself


A big thanks goes to Artisanix! Thank you for your mod resource:
Paintings and frames: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17423
I replaced the texture of the images with others! Hope you enjoy it, have fun!


Install MAIN
Drag and drop into your Skyrim Data Folder!

Install UPDATE
Drag and drop into your Skyrim Data Folder and overwrite the existing file!


Have Fun
author: Rakani1112
